project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a command-line interface contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and interactions will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact
Implement functionality to update a contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement the JSON file handling to store and retrieve contacts
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
